com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat

Class Properties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • com.anji.util.Properties
            • com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat.Properties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class Properties
extends Properties
    Extension of Properties that provides some convenience methods for retrieving commonly required objects and event communication functionality via AHNIEventListeners.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • configureLog4JSettings

        public void configureLog4JSettings(java.lang.String outputDir,
                          boolean disableFiles)
        Modifies the Log4J settings to configure the file loggers.
        Parameters:
        outputDir - The directory that file loggers should create files in.
        disableFiles - If true then all file logging is disabled.

      • getOutputDirPath

        public java.lang.String getOutputDirPath()
        Returns the path of the directory where files for this experiment should be written to. Includes a trailing slash.
        See Also:
        logFilesEnabled()

      • setEvolver

        public void setEvolver(HyperNEATEvolver evolver)
        Set the HyperNEATEvolver that is handling this run. This method should generally only be called by HyperNEATEvolver.
